title: Site and Services Coordinator - ABQ
description:
We are seeking a Studio Site and Stage Coordinator to join our growing Studio Management and Services team. This position will be housed in Albuquerque, New Mexico. The position will be responsible for supporting the Site and Services team that oversees the ABQ studio facility.¬†

The Opportunity
Netflix is one of the world‚Äôs leading entertainment services with over 238 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

The Role
A successful candidate will be passionate, self-motivated, proactive, quick-thinking, flexible, able to pivot when necessary, thorough and able to juggle multiple and diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and unwavering attention to detail at all times. This is a demanding and fast-moving position that requires someone who is a proactive and positive thinker, and able to exercise good judgment and communication.¬†

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Support day-to-day facility operations
Support facility repair and maintenance programs
Fulfill client repairs and maintenance requests
Responsible for delivering excellence in customer service
Accustomed to working in a fast-paced environment, able to multitask, and meet multiple tight deadlines
Any other duties to support the productions and department
Create a positive atmosphere of professionalism and support

extras.title: Qualifications
content: 3+ years experience working on a campus environment and in facilities management.
Must have a strong knowledge of facilities activities
Must have Building Maintenance System (BMS) experience
Must have Mechanical, Electric and Plumbing (MEP) repair and maintenance experience
Understanding of GeoThermal and Solar energy a plus
OSHA 10 or 30 certificate required
Strong understanding of EHS regulations and best practices
Team player with the ability to oversee projects in a fast-paced environment
Self-starter with the ability to prioritize and respond accordingly
Great communicator who can build strong working relationships with vendors, and internal and external partners
Ability to be discreet and handle confidential information
Ability to move between narrow, confined, or elevated spaces, over sloping, uneven, or slippery surfaces and steps; ascend/descend stairs, service ramps, and elevators
Ability to repetitively move and transport up to 50 lbs
Willingness to continue learning to ensure understanding of current production process and equipment and studios
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Proficiency in Google Docs, Sheets, Gmail, Gdrive, MS Word, Excel. AirTable a plus
Willingness to take educated risks and think out of the box
